glsa.title: Botan: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Botan, the worst of which might allow remote attackers to obtain ECDSA secret keys.

background.p: Botan (Japanese for peony) is a cryptography library written in C++11.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Botan. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker might obtain ECDSA secret keys via a timing side-channel attack or could possibly bypass TLS policy.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Botan users should upgrade to the latest version:
